definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 巨無霸漢堡包指數|巨无霸汉堡包指数[Ju4 wu2 ba4 han4 bao3 bao1 Zhi3 shu4]
place name in Ningxia with rock carving conjectured to be a stage in the development of Chinese characters

sentences.english: There were insignificant effects on the fertility rate by cutting barley awn.
sentences.chinese: 剪芒对大麦结实率无显著影响。

sentences.english: Relatively genetic background of barley landraces were complex.
sentences.chinese: 大麦地方品种遗传背景相对复杂。

sentences.english: A poppy's red in its barley bed.
sentences.chinese: 在大麦床里的罂粟花就是艳红色。

sentences.english: What type of whisky is distilled entirely from malted barley?
sentences.chinese: 什么样的威士忌完全从大麦麦芽中蒸馏而来？

sentences.english: On either side the river lie Long fields of barley and of rye.
sentences.chinese: 绵长的大麦与黑麦田伸延在河岸两旁。

sentences.english: Rape and barley are grown is rotation here.
What type of whisky is distilled entirely from malted barley?
sentences.chinese: 麦芽指的是发芽至开始出现根和茎的大麦。

sentences.english: So I bought her for fifteen shekels of silver and about a homer and a lethek of barley.
sentences.chinese: 我便用银子十五舍客勒，大麦一贺梅珥半，买他归我。

sentences.english: Boil the barley and carrot separately until tender.
sentences.chinese: 分别将大麦和胡萝卜块沸煮至鲜嫩。

sentences.english: Most beers are made from barley.
sentences.chinese: 大多数啤酒是大麦酿制的。

sentences.english: Store-fed animals are fed on maize, wheat and barley in the race to fatten them up as fast as possible.
sentences.chinese: 圈养牲畜则是用玉米小麦和大麦尽快的催肥而成的。

sentences.english: Christmas comes but once a year.
It is produced by cultivation of Saccharomyces cerevisiae on malted barley in the production of beer.
sentences.chinese: 它是由种植酿酒酵母的大麦麦芽生产啤酒。

sentences.english: Product Description: Dry food formula made with Lamb, Millet, Amaranth, Barley and Brown Rice.
sentences.chinese: 配方使用羊，小米，苋，大麦和啡米而制成。

sentences.english: A medicinal infusion, such as sweetened barley water.
sentences.chinese: 汤剂药物浸剂，比如加糖的大麦汤。

sentences.english: So I bought her to me for fifteen pieces of silver, and for an homer of barley, and an half homer of barley
sentences.chinese: 我便用银子十五舍客勒，大麦一贺梅珥半，买她归我。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
